languages.text: "Это невозможно... Он..." {n}В глазах Ардженты вспыхивают костры ярости.{/n} "Ты ответишь, изменник! Ответишь за всех наших братьев и сестер! Скольких ты заманил на смерть?! Сознавайся!"
"Impossible... He—" {n}Argenta's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "You will pay, treacherous serpent! You will pay for all our brothers and sisters! How many have you led to their deaths? Confess!"
languages.original_text: "Это невозможно... Он..." {n}В глазах Ардженты вспыхивают костры ярости.{/n} "Ты ответишь, изменник! Ответишь за всех наших братьев и сестер! Скольких ты заманил на смерть?! Сознавайся!"

traits.locale_text: "Impossible... He..." {n}Argenta's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "You will pay, treasonous serpent! You will answer for all our brothers and sisters! How many have you led to their deaths? Confess!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Impossible... Il...{n}Le regard d'Argenta flamboie de colère.{/n} Vous allez payer, espèce de traître ! Vous allez payer pour tous nos frères et nos sœurs ! Combien d'entre eux sont morts par votre faute ? Confessez-vous ! »
languages.original_text: "Impossible... He—" {n}Argenta's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "You will pay, treacherous serpent! You will pay for all our brothers and sisters! How many have you led to their deaths? Confess!"

traits.locale_text: « Impossible... Il...{n}Le regard d'Argenta flamboie de colère.{/n} Vous allez payer, espèce de traître ! Vous allez payer pour tous nos frères et nos sœurs ! Combien d'entre eux sont morts par votre faute ? Confessez-vous ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这不可能……他——”{n}阿洁塔双眼中闪着怒火。{/n}“你一定会付出代价，你这阴险的毒蛇！你要为我们所有的兄弟姐妹付出代价！你究竟害死了多少人？快说！”
languages.original_text: "Impossible... He—" {n}Argenta's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "You will pay, treacherous serpent! You will pay for all our brothers and sisters! How many have you led to their deaths? Confess!"

traits.locale_text: “这不可能……他——”{n}阿洁塔双眼中闪着怒火。{/n}“你一定会付出代价，你这阴险的毒蛇！你要为我们所有的兄弟姐妹付出代价！你究竟害死了多少人？快说！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「バカな…この男が…」{n}アルジェンタの目が怒りに燃えた。{/n}「ただではおかんぞ、この裏切り者の悪魔め！私たちの兄弟姉妹のために償わせてやる！貴様は一体何人を死に追いやった？白状するがいい！」
languages.original_text: "Impossible... He—" {n}Argenta's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "You will pay, treacherous serpent! You will pay for all our brothers and sisters! How many have you led to their deaths? Confess!"

traits.locale_text: 「バカな…この男が…」{n}アルジェンタの目が怒りに燃えた。{/n}「ただではおかんぞ、この裏切り者の悪魔め！私たちの兄弟姉妹のために償わせてやる！貴様は一体何人を死に追いやった？白状するがいい！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Unmöglich ... Er ..." {n}Argentas Augen blitzen zornig auf.{/n} "Dafür werdet Ihr bezahlen, verräterische Schlange! Ihr werdet für alle unsere Brüder und Schwestern bezahlen! Wie viele habt Ihr zum Tod geführt? Gesteht!"
languages.original_text: "Impossible... He—" {n}Argenta's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "You will pay, treacherous serpent! You will pay for all our brothers and sisters! How many have you led to their deaths? Confess!"

traits.locale_text: "Unmöglich ... Er ..." {n}Argentas Augen blitzen zornig auf.{/n} "Dafür werdet Ihr bezahlen, verräterische Schlange! Ihr werdet für alle unsere Brüder und Schwestern bezahlen! Wie viele habt Ihr zum Tod geführt? Gesteht!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «No es posible... Nos ha...». {n}La mirada de Argenta se incendia de cólera.{/n} «¡Pagarás por esto, serpiente traicionera! ¡Pagarás por todos nuestros hermanos y hermanas! ¿A cuántos has conducido ya a la muerte? ¡Confiesa!».
languages.original_text: "Impossible... He—" {n}Argenta's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "You will pay, treacherous serpent! You will pay for all our brothers and sisters! How many have you led to their deaths? Confess!"

traits.locale_text: «No es posible... Nos ha...». {n}La mirada de Argenta se incendia de cólera.{/n} «¡Pagarás por esto, serpiente traicionera! ¡Pagarás por todos nuestros hermanos y hermanas! ¿A cuántos has conducido ya a la muerte? ¡Confiesa!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "İmkânsız... O..." {n}Argenta'nın gözleri hiddetle ışıldıyor.{/n} "Seni hain yılan! Bunun bedelini ödeyeceksin! Tüm kardeşlerimizin hesabını vereceksin! Kaç kişiyi ölüme sürükledin? İtiraf et!"
languages.original_text: "Impossible... He—" {n}Argenta's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "You will pay, treacherous serpent! You will pay for all our brothers and sisters! How many have you led to their deaths? Confess!"

traits.locale_text: "İmkânsız... O..." {n}Argenta'nın gözleri hiddetle ışıldıyor.{/n} "Seni hain yılan! Bunun bedelini ödeyeceksin! Tüm kardeşlerimizin hesabını vereceksin! Kaç kişiyi ölüme sürükledin? İtiraf et!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
